explanation: [0-0] In front of a room wall, a man with green hair wearing a black top and black-framed glasses appears, his mouth wide open in an exaggerated expression as he looks forward. At the top of the screen, a line of white subtitles reads "You can't say Kawasaki with your own voice," followed by a white exclamation mark.
[0-2] As the man with green hair makes an exaggerated expression and speaks towards the camera, he raises his left hand and makes a grasping motion.
[0-2] As the man with green hair makes an exaggerated expression and speaks towards the camera, he raises his left hand and makes a grasping motion.

[2-12] Suddenly, the camera changes, and the green-haired man's expression becomes calm. He smiles and opens his mouth to say something to the camera. At the same time, a line of white subtitles appears on the screen that reads "oh really," followed by a white question mark. Then, every time the man opens his mouth to speak, the screen shakes from side to side until the man with green hair smiles and nods towards the camera.
